short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popjustice.com's Ragin' Binman extension replaces mentions of Rag'n'Bone Man with the words Ragin' Binman.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you think Rag'n'Bone Man sounds like an outraged rubbish collector, you're in luck. Popjustice's Ragin' Binman Chrome extension replaces mentions of Rag'n'Bone Man with the words Ragin' Binman.
